void *  key 
)

Generate a random key for the specificed EVP_CIPHER.

Parameters
ctxEVP_CIPHER_CTX type to build the key for.
keyreturn key, must be at least EVP_CIPHER_key_length() byte long.
Returns
1 for success, 0 for failure.
